name: Moving On
paragraphs: You close MonstrEats and spend the next few months reflecting on your experiences. You focus on healing and moving on from the trauma of the past. Eventually, you find a new passion and begin to explore it with enthusiasm.

One day, you receive an unexpected letter from a stranger. They thank you for sharing your story and tell you that they too have faced similar struggles. They invite you to join their support group, where you can connect with others who understand what you've been through.

You accept the invitation and attend the support group, feeling a sense of belonging and camaraderie. You realize that while you can never forget the past, you can use it to help others and make a positive impact in the world.
